td.a: Governor Bullock Extends No On Site School Through April 24, 2020
td.br:
April 7, 2020
Students, Parents and Community,
Governor Bullock recently extended the on-campus school closure through April 24, 2020. The following plans are an update on the plans and actions as of April 8, 2020. This informational letter pertains to the continuing plans for the Huntley Project School District. Please call 406-967-2540 for information or concerns. Please leave a voicemail if and someone from the school district will return your call when time permits.
This is the Boxholder for April of 2020. This includes a tentative activity schedule and update letter for the continuing plan through April 10, 2020.
